QueryResult.text: SELECT t.prProjectID PROJECT_ID, t.prID TEAM_ID, al_s.slice_date WEEK_START_DATE, MAX(ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL(c.fte,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((CASE WHEN al_sr.request_name = 'WEEKLYRESOURCEALLOCCURVE' THEN al_s.slice ELSE 0 END) / c.fte)*100 END,0)) ALLOC_L_PERCENT, MAX(ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL(c.fte,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((CASE WHEN al_sr.request_name = 'WEEKLYRESOURCEALLOCCURVE' THEN al_s.slice ELSE 0 END ) / c.fte) END,2)) ALLOC_L_FTE, MAX(ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL(c.fte,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((CASE WHEN al_sr.request_name = 'WEEKLYRESOURCEHARDALLOC' THEN al_s.slice ELSE 0 END ) / c.fte)*100 END,0)) HARD_ALLOC_L_PERCENT, MAX(ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL(c.fte,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((CASE WHEN al_sr.request_name = 'WEEKLYRESOURCEHARDALLOC' THEN al_s.slice ELSE 0 END ) / c.fte) END,2)) HARD_ALLOC_L_FTE FROM prteam t INNER JOIN srm_resources r ON t.prResourceID = r.id INNER JOIN prj_blb_slices al_s ON t.prID = al_s.prj_object_ID INNER JOIN prj_blb_slicerequests al_sr ON al_s.slice_request_id = al_sr.id INNER JOIN rpt_calendar c ON al_s.slice_date = c.start_date WHERE (r.resource_type = 0) AND (al_sr.request_name IN ('WEEKLYRESOURCEALLOCCURVE','WEEKLYRESOURCEHARDALLOC')) AND (c.period_type = 'WEEKLY') GROUP BY t.prProjectID, t.prID, al_s.slice_date
